content: By far his most dangerous move will come when he adopts a martial arts stance, holding a raised fist behind his head while dropping the other arm.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Non-Able'.
The content is as follows:
By far his most dangerous move will come when he adopts a martial arts stance, holding a raised fist behind his head while dropping the other arm.
